name: This Is Not
description:
This is not P.. M.. . But it's a simple little arcade inspired game. You control the Mr. triangle with WASD or the arrow keys.

The game was made for Unexpected Jam, so something is perhaps not what you will expect when you first see the game. But what make it's different I will not tell you.

Sound is by the way an important part of the game.

Good luck and have fun
